moves.1. e4: I opened up with e4, my favorite when I started this game, though I like the English more now.
moves.2. Nf3: Maybe getting into some dull game :).
moves.2... Nc6 3. Bc4: I opted for an Italian game or even a 2 knights defense.
moves.3... h6: Preventing the 4.ng4 and the c bishop in the near future.
moves.4... d6: This was a big mistake, it wins at least 1 pawn, I will show you.
moves.5. dxe5 Nxe5 6. Nxe5 dxe5 7. Bxf7+: This was the move that won that pawn, but...
moves.7... Kxf7: OMG, I was thinking, giving up the queen.
moves.8... Be7: I was anticipating bd6 with thought of maybe trapping the queen.
moves.11. Qxe5 Re8: Of course that bishop will move :D.
moves.12... Bb4: Nice, attacking the e pawn twice and preparing to kill it's only defender, too bad it won't work.
moves.14. Qc7+: Block with the b4 bishop or you are totally screwed.
moves.15. Qc4+ Ke8 16. Qxb4: I think he had not got enough, what is he expecting :S.
